text: Suhang Nembang is a politician from Nepal. He is a member of the CPN (UML). He is currently serving in the 2nd Federal Parliament of Nepal. He was elected in the 2024 Nepalese by-election from the Ilam 2 constituency.He was nominated as a candidate after the death of his father Subash Chandra Nembang. ==Early life and education== He was born in the Ilam, Nepal. He completed his early eduaction from Galaxy public school, Kathmandu. He attended the Kathmandu School of Law for his higher education. He obtained his Bachelor of Laws (BLLB) and Master of Laws (LLM) degrees in Commercial Law. ==Career== He practiced law before becoming a politician. He worked at Kantipur Law Associates and Research Centre in Kathmandu. ==Political career== In the by- election he defeated his closest opponent Dambar Bahadur Khadka of Nepali Congress. He won by a total of 5,830 votes. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Suhang Nembang
